channel.title: How do i make myself admin?
channel.description: Hi, I'm new to Moparscape and i need help with making myself an admin, my first question is: Do i need to put up my server to make myself admin? or can i just do it on my own server? if i can do it on my own, could someone please guide me through it, it will be greatly appreciated, thanks! ;)

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

not search FOR client.java search IN client.java

Wait, do you even have a source? Like do you own a server?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin?

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

Search for

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

you should see something like

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) { playerRights = 3; }

Where I put “Name HerE” Put your name

Save. Exit. Compile.

Bang, your the owner!

this is easier

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin?

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Cozmo891 Cozmo891
item.description:
@Cozmo891 wrote:

run ur server i go into it and ur char file will appear in ur char folder, go to ur char folder and find your name, then you will see character-rights = 0 0 for normal, 1 for mod (silver crown) 2 for server admin(gold) and 3 for owner(gold) then just relog into ur server

Read full topic
